I can help create a retirement plan for you.

A good retirement plan should determine if you will have enough money (from pension, Social Security, outside savings and investment income) to live comfortably until old age.

We can determine a good target “old age” for you (age 85, 90 or 95).

Retirement Planning can help you understand the smart way to use funds from your IRA, Roth IRA and other investment funds when you are retired.

I can help you with all your retirement planning needs. Contact me today for more information: 310-287-2095
